thread.section_title: Fishpond Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fishpond | www.fishpond.com.au
thread.title: Colin Smith

author: Colin Smith
title: Colin Smith
text: I have been buying books from Fishpond for many years and found them to be trustworthy, books arrive very quickly, packaged up extremely well, if there is an issue it is handled quickly so I have no problems suggesting to people to buy their books online as it is so simple and the emails keep you up to date, with orders so keep up the great work as there is still many books to buy.
